properties.name: Borisch Manufacturing
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina4511 East Paris Ave SE, Grand Rapids, Mi, 49512Borisch Manufacturing was founded in 1994 by Jonathan Borisch who was previously employed at Technical Systems, a military contractor based in Grand Rapids and founded in 1969. Borisch is particularly proud of their work with the military, portraying themselves as supporting the troops in a time when it is unpopular and helping in the war effort.

properties.name: D&M Midwest
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina571 20 Mile Rd, Cedar Springs, Mi, 49319D & M Midwest is a small company that specializes in supplying industrial spare parts for procurement by the Department of Defense. According to their web site, D & M Midwest is "woman owned and operated" and one of the largest government contractors in West Michigan

properties.name: Dover Resources Inc
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina1809 Century Ave SW, Grand Rapids, Mi, 49509

properties.name: Eaton Aerospace
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina3675 Patterson Ave, Grand Rapids, Mi, 49588Eaton Aerospace is an avionics company that produces components for both civilian and military aircraft. Eaton\'s corporate headquarters are in Irvine, California, but it operates a factory in Grand Rapids. Eaton manufactures components used in a wide variety of military aircraft including the F-15 Eagle, the F-18 Hornet, the P-3 Orion, UH-60 Black Hawk, the CH-56 Sea Knight, and the SH-60 Seahawk. Parts manufactured by Eaton include fuel system components, hoses, gasket materials, and components used in on-board missile systems.

properties.name: Evans Tempcon
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina701 Ann St SW, Grand Rapids, Mi, 49504Evans Tempcon specializes in heating and air conditioning systems and provides such systems for military applications.

properties.name: Grand Valley State University
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina1 Campus Dr, Allendale, Mi, 49401Unlike many other universities around the country, Grand Valley State University (GVSU) does relatively little research for the military. Its main connection comes in a partnership with SORDAL, a Holland base company that develops high-tech products for commercial and government applications.

properties.name: L-3 Communications Avionics
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina5353 52nd St SE, Grand Rapids, Mi, 49512L-3 Communications, of which the local operation is a part, is one of the top 10 military contractors in the country, ranking 8th in 2006. L-3 bought bought B.F. Goodrich Avionics Systems, a local aerospace company, for 88 million in February of 2003. L-3 makes components for a variety of military aircraft including the F-16 Falcon, the F-18 Hornet, the P-3 Orion, and the UH-60 Blackhawk.

properties.name: Smiths Industries Aerospace
properties.description: Posted by Leslypollina3290 Patterson SE, Grand Rapids, Mi, 49512Smiths Industries Aerospace is a division of Smiths Group, a large corporation that manufactures components for civilian and military aircraft. In 2006, Smiths Group ranked 26th on a list of the top 100 defense contractors, with 25% of its work being for military applications. Smiths makes components for systems such as the F-15 Eagle, the F-16 Falcon, the F-18 Hornet, the Blackhawk (UH-60), the F-4 Phantom, and many other weapons systems.
